unlike.translation[0].definitions[0].def: completely different from a particular person or thing
unlike.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Tammy was unlike any other woman I have ever known.
unlike.translation[0].definitions[1].def: not typical of someone at all
unlike.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: It’s unlike Greg to be late.
unlike.translation[0].definitions[2].def: used when saying how one person or thing is different from another
unlike.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Unlike most people in the office, I don’t come to work by car.
unlike.translation[2].definitions[0].def: to show on Facebook that you no longer like or agree with something, after showing that you liked it
